alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 9:59PM EST until January 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun. .The Green River at Calhoun is expected to fall below flood stage nearly 24 hours earlier than previously forecast. It is now expected to fall below flood stage Saturday morning. For the Green River...including Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 22.1 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
